item.title: Lawyer of whistleblower in Trump impeachment case sues administration over revoked security clearance

item.title: What happens on 'bad days': Troubling revelations about John Fetterman and Joe Biden
item.description: Senator John Fetterman responds to report raising concerns about his mental health, disputing claims from former staff and calling it inaccurate.

item.title: Trump admin continues Biden defense of abortion drug mifepristone, asks court to dismiss lawsuit
item.description: The Trump administration continues to defend rules that regulate the abortion drug mifepristone by asking a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit.

item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Self Deport, Get $1,000
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.
